wordpressPost.title: WeSpire Celebrates Seven Years
wordpressPost.content:
This past Saturday, WeSpire celebrated its seventh birthday. This remarkable achievement could not have been reached without all of your support and encouragement.

As many of you know, we began our journey back in 2010 as Practically Green, a consumer-facing app, aimed at helping passionate mothers take positive action around sustainability. Founder and CEO, Susan Hunt Stevens realized the technology’s greater potential after being approached by an executive at a large enterprise who was interested in using the app to engage employees in its company-wide sustainability initiatives. Practically Green eventually rebranded to WeSpire, and the rest is history.
Watch as Susan Hunt Stevens recounts WeSpire’s seven-year journey, giving you an up-close and personal look into our company’s history and the influential people who helped us get where we are today.

Susan Hunt Stevens on WeSpire’s Seventh Birthday


Of course, no birthday celebration is complete without a party, which we had the opportunity to share in last Thursday with our amazing WeSpire family. Special thanks to our friends and neighbors, Kuvee, for helping us celebrate in style!

Here are a few photos of our special day

[2jslideshow id=”2151″]

Thank you to all of those people who got us here, and here’s to many, many more! ‘ Susan Hunt Stevens
